survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Personal Stylist Apps Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their experience and satisfaction with AI-powered personal stylist applications, focusing on usability, accuracy, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use an AI-powered personal stylist app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use an AI-powered personal stylist app?

questions.question_text: What features do you find most useful in AI-powered personal stylist apps? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse user preferences.

script.question_text: What features do you find most useful in AI-powered personal stylist apps? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the style recommendations provided by the app?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the style recommendations provided by the app?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered personal stylist apps?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered personal stylist apps?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the AI-powered personal stylist app you use to others?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure net promoter score (NPS) potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the AI-powered personal stylist app you use to others?
